title: Cynthia_2
author: Cynthia_2
content: Undoubtedly Oscar swap is coming along with great things like arbitrum blockchain , new additions to Dex but to my mind it has been unable to resolve the major issues that are being faced by crypto fraternity. People are scared of scams and frauds due to Dex but nothing has been incorporated in oscar to sort out this issue. Yeild farming will lead to market saturation. Due to repetition of  farming yield feature in every project crytpo market has fell to its lowest , it involves volatile and untested tokens that can destructive for users. Oscar team is lagging behind in digital marketing. No matter how much good your content is , if your page doesn’t appear among the top search results, it will become matter of opinion. To make OSCARSWAP stand out among other project it's team need to find a solution to these problems

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Cynthia_2 on April 27, 2023, 10:30:46 AMUndoubtedly Oscar swap is coming along with great things like arbitrum blockchain , new additions to Dex but to my mind it has been unable to resolve the major issues that are being faced by crypto fraternity. People are scared of scams and frauds due to Dex but nothing has been incorporated in oscar to sort out this issue. Yeild farming will lead to market saturation. Due to repetition of  farming yield feature in every project crytpo market has fell to its lowest , it involves volatile and untested tokens that can destructive for users. Oscar team is lagging behind in digital marketing. No matter how much good your content is , if your page doesn’t appear among the top search results, it will become matter of opinion. To make OSCARSWAP stand out among other project it's team need to find a solution to these problems I personally did not get any Arbitrum from that big airdrop, therefore i am not really following all the new projects and stuff that is appearing on the Arbitrum Network. Even i have noticed though, that the Arbitrum chain is very hot at the moment. For me the reason for that is that big airdrop because ten of thousands of people have gotten a significant 500$+ airdrop and a lot of people even got way more. Of course that wealth is now on that chain and therefore those people that were getting the airdrop also want to use that wealth to create even more income from it. That is why the TVL on the Arbitrum chain is so high because everyone is putting their "free" money to work.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Because it is hype now and due to the arbitrum consecutive airdrops from different memecoins. Of course degen traders are now lining up to secure some profits from it. People love a good memecoin and shitcouns as long as they are earning from it. Its really hard to grasp the play between these projects but its an easy concept. Who gets early thats profit who get last will have loss on the game.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Let's be honest.Most new projects want to get some attention from ARB Ecosystem, especially chasing the hype. ARB have a good hype and attention at this moment, that's why some new project trying to take advantage.It's just same like Polygon, Solana and other at the time they're booming.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Cynthia_2 on April 27, 2023, 10:30:46 AMUndoubtedly Oscar swap is coming along with great things like arbitrum blockchain , new additions to Dex but to my mind it has been unable to resolve the major issues that are being faced by crypto fraternity. Oscar team is lagging behind in digital marketing. No matter how much good your content is , if your page doesn’t appear among the top search results, it will become matter of opinion. To make OSCARSWAP stand out among other project it's team need to find a solution to these problems The main reason is the airdrop given by the Arbitrum ecosystem. Also, there are a lot of projects built on the Arbitrum ecosystem compared to other ecosystems. I received more than 8000 ARB from the airdrop. Now other ecosystems like starknet and layer zero will follow the arbitrum. Another reason is the big volume of the arbitrum chain.

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: seeing arbitrum, remember that last year's solona was very booming with its NFT, but when solona was sunk, the project carried out by SOL also faded,I think the new projects are racing to keep up with the current HYpe and fomo of ARB, just my opinionand I won't be looking for more detailed info about arb because I'm not part of their aiddrop winner

comments.author: naikturun
comments.body: well i think so too, the ads that post the top searches will be seen by others.that's why ad placement for promotions will be very useful at this time.when it is already good enough then the evaluation of the project is done by the people.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: I think it's simply the fact that some developers push some projects and get big and quick profits, that makes crypto market participants see the opportunity and FOMO follow, I really Haven't seen much of an impression, although it can be admitted that the ecosystem on ARB is growing very fast. But actually in recent days the hype about the meme brings me back to the old feeling, a trick to hit people's greed, I can see many people getting ARBs from the airdrop and also will spend them all on low-quality projects through the guise of greed.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: From what I understand, you are concerned about the potential issues that Oscar swap may face in the crypto market. I completely agree with you that scams and frauds are a major concern for the crypto fraternity, and it's important for projects like Oscar swap to take steps to address these issues.However, I think it's also important to remember that the crypto market is constantly evolving and changing. While yield farming may have led to market saturation in the past, there are always new and innovative ideas that can shake things up and lead to new opportunities.As for the issue of digital marketing, I think you make a valid point. It's crucial to have a strong online presence in order to stand out among other projects. That being said, I believe that the success of a project ultimately comes down to the strength of its team and its ability to execute on its vision.

comments.body: Quote from: Cynthia_2 on April 27, 2023, 10:30:46 AMUndoubtedly Oscar swap is coming along with great things like arbitrum blockchain , new additions to Dex but to my mind it has been unable to resolve the major issues that are being faced by crypto fraternity. To make OSCARSWAP stand out among other project it's team need to find a solution to these problems Oscar swap? what kind of utility is it under arbitrum? this is probably what you're talking about dude, right? https://oscarswap.com/ Maybe that's why it's being given attention because somehow the arbitrum community believes that the coins will increase in the future.And it is really possible that it will increase in the coming times, especially if the value of Ethereum kicks hard in the market because it is certain that the utilities under ERC20 will also submit to increase in value such as Uniswap, Matic, Arb, and others yet.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Cynthia_2 on April 27, 2023, 10:30:46 AMUndoubtedly Oscar swap is coming along with great things like arbitrum blockchain , new additions to Dex but to my mind it has been unable to resolve the major issues that are being faced by crypto fraternity. Oscar team is lagging behind in digital marketing. No matter how much good your content is , if your page doesn’t appear among the top search results, it will become matter of opinion. To make OSCARSWAP stand out among other project it's team need to find a solution to these problems Why wouldn't they? It's the hottest layer 2 at the moment and people want to try it out so it gets traffic. I would totally launch anything in that right now if i wanted attention to my project. But it will fade after it will get flooded and filled with scams as bep20 did. Best thing about eth high fees was that there wasn't as much scam projects. I mean there was scams but bsc had exponentially more of them as they costed next to nothing. Same thing will happen with ARB sooner or later imho.

comments.author: huu78
comments.body: Yield farming can also be a risky and volatile activity, and it's important for investors to understand the potential risks before participating. It's important for projects to provide clear and transparent information about their yield farming features, and to ensure that users understand the risks involved.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: glendall on April 27, 2023, 02:19:58 PMseeing arbitrum, remember that last year's solona was very booming with its NFT, but when solona was sunk, the project carried out by SOL also faded,I think the new projects are racing to keep up with the current HYpe and fomo of ARB, just my opinionand I won't be looking for more detailed info about arb because I'm not part of their aiddrop winnerIt all sums up that they've been built through hype and that's why it won't be surprising anymore if most of the projects built on ARB and even ARB itself will not perform very well when the bull run comes. Although there's no exception to it and these are just speculations just as how others are speculating about the projects built through ARB has great future. We will never know if they're going to be like but one thing for sure is that, those who have received profit from the arb airdrop really did well and it's an overall success for them thinking that anything related to arb will become successful.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Arbitrum did airdrop that change the standard of living for most airdrop hunters so what do you expect. The hype of the airdrop and the overall excitement about the blockchain is still very present. Most projects are now taking advantage of this hype to quickly launch, even though the most hyped among them are meme with very short period before they fall off the radar. Even though Optimism also gave airdrop it is no match to the arbitrum network hype.
